history: TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER of us
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER public transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you want to go?For example, you can say I'm going to the airport
USER I'd like to go to the airport.
TTS Okay, going to pittsburgh international airport. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where are you leaving from?
USER Forbes and Murray
TTS Okay, leaving from forbes avenue and murray avenue. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you want to travel
USER I'd like to take the next bus.
TTS When do you want to travel
USER I'd like to take the next bus.
TTS When do you want to travel
USER next bus
TTS Okay, travelling at 08:42 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER Yes, please.
TTS <speak> Ok, great! <break strength='strong' /> Feel free to ask me to repeat a step, <break strength='weak' /> if you didn't catch it the first time. </speak>
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 3 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 1 hour 14 minutes, and you will take 2 busses. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> <break strength='weak' /> Let me know when you are ready for the next step. </speak>
USER I'm ready.

TTS <speak><break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 64 <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Shady avenue at Fifth avenue.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 9:00pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER Wait, please continue.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Walk for about 1 min to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Fifth avenue at Shady avenue. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue

TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 28X <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Pittsburgh Airport Upper Level . .</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 9:19pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I proceed? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> </speak>
TTS <speak> Would you like to hear an alternate route?</speak>
USER No.
TTS <speak> Were the provided directions useful? </speak>
